data.name: Survive 4 Pleasure
data.detailed_description:
S4P (Survive for pleasure) is a mix of Zombie shooter and relaxing Strip club games.
You will go to fight zombies' waves in another dimension then chill in the strip club and enjoy playing with the models.

The more waves of zombies you fight the more pleasure you get!

Strip Club

  • Select your sexuality (pan, gay, lesbian, straight)
  • 3D discover the model and use different dances and emotes.
  • Undress the model after reaching certain levels.
  • Photo Mode (better rotate, zoom in, change colors, add stickers)
  • unlick the pleasure room after reaching level 15
  • Unlock the second model after clearing all the zombies' waves.

Survival mode

  • Protect the gates and the scientist.
  • Clear all zombies' waves
  • Buy weapons.
  • Use abilities and skills.

Features

-Challenging difficulty levels.
-Different types of zombies to fight.
-Exciting rewarding moments with the sexy girls.

More waves are planned (Dragons, Vampires etc)
More sexy models to be added in the next updates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100T | AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon R7-250X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game has certain adult features such as undressing the characters and playing with them.
